lessons.english: Do you have any cough medicine?

lessons.japanese: 咳止めとアスピリンが必要です。
lessons.english: You should buy some cough medicine and aspirin.

lessons.japanese: この咳止め用トローチは苦味があるがよくきく。
lessons.english: These cough lozenges taste bitter but they will do you much good.

lessons.japanese: その咳はタバコのせいよ。
lessons.english: Your cough is the consequence of smoking.

lessons.japanese: 咳止めシロップ。本番前に一口飲まないと落ち着かない！
lessons.english: Cough syrup. If I don't drink a mouthful before going on stage I can't settle down!

lessons.japanese: 母親はトムの咳のことを心配している。
lessons.english: Tom's mother worries about his cough.
